SEARCH
Package com.game.core.scene.graphics

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
com.game.core.scene.graphics.Tile
public class Tile extends Object
Represents a tile in the game with graphical properties such as texture, size, scale, and type. Handles loading textures, scaling them, and drawing the tile on a canvas.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a `Tile` object using the provided texture and scale.

  • Constructor Details

    • Tile

      public Tile(String sourceTexture, Float scale)
      Constructs a `Tile` object using the provided texture and scale.
      Parameters:
      sourceTexture - the file name of the texture to use for this tile.
      scale - the scaling factor for the tile.

    • Tile

      public Tile(String sourceTexture, TileType type, Float scale)
      Constructs a `Tile` object with a specified texture, type, and scale.
      Parameters:
      sourceTexture - the file name of the texture to use for this tile.
      type - the type of the tile (e.g., OBJECT, BACKGROUND).
      scale - the scaling factor for the tile.

    • Tile

      public Tile(String sourceTexture, TileType type, Float scale, boolean hasDefaultSize)
      Constructs a `Tile` object with detailed configuration for texture, type, scale, and size.
      Parameters:
      sourceTexture - the file name of the texture to use for this tile.
      type - the type of the tile (e.g., OBJECT, BACKGROUND).
      scale - the scaling factor for the tile.
      hasDefaultSize - specifies whether the default size should be used or not.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, float x, float y)
      Renders the tile on the given canvas at the specified coordinates. If the texture is undefined, it draws a placeholder rectangle.
      Parameters:
      gc - the `GraphicsContext` used for rendering the tile.
      x - the x-coordinate of the tile's position.
      y - the y-coordinate of the tile's position.
